document.full_text: the lloyd's of london  insurance market will take a $3.8 billion hit from earthquakes and floods in the first quarter, and predicted the high level of catastrophe claims will lift insurance prices this year.
document.title: lloyd's of london sees $3.8 billion disaster hit
lines_and_colors: the lloyd's of london  insurance market will take a $3.8 billion hit from earthquakes and floods in the first quarter, and predicted the high level of catastrophe claims will lift insurance prices this year.
